synopsis.text:
The fifth season of Boku no Hero Academia brings two thrilling original animation episodes! In "Hero League of Baseball" (HLB), pro-heroes who love baseball form a league, with the final championship game between the Orcas and the Lionels. As they compete, using their quirks to gain the upper hand, a villain interrupts the game. Who will emerge victorious in this intense showdown?

In "Laugh! As if you are in hell," Deku, Bakugo, and Todoroki join Endeavor's agency for an internship. Tasked with finding a villain called Smiley who doodles around the city, they initially let other heroes handle the case. But when Smiley targets Endeavor's house, the No.1 hero and the 1-A trio set out to capture him. Little do they know, Smiley's quirk forces anyone who looks into his eyes to laugh hysterically. Can they overcome their laughter and apprehend the villain? Join these young heroes for action-packed adventures and unforgettable laughs!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
